pages.text: $(li)The Feather Falling enchantment can be applied in any kind of Boots.$(br)$(li)This enchantment reduces the fall damage receives and teleportation damage receives from an Ender Pearl.
pages.title: Feather Falling

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Feather Falling)
